short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you that you are dying

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
mori is a chrome extension that reminds you that you are dying and how much time you have left.

Each block represents one week of your life leading up to where you are now. Each row is one year of your life leading up to your birthday. Together it shows every week of your life until you are 80 years old.

mori helps you focus on tasks that are important, achieve goals, stay in the moment and accept death. Use the information to your advantage.

To change the date click the date and a popup will show.

For comments / suggestions you can email me at: jordan@howlett.io

Stay tuned for alternate versions!

Update June 2014:

Hover over blocks to show age / month. Remove some of the sidebar items, for now. They were breaking on some platforms. Would need a better way to show them.
